channel.title: Control Room Bug
channel.description:
I haven't played the game in a few days so i thought i would go back in and try it some more. This happens right after I get the suit at the beginning of the game.
I go out of the room where the elevator takes you up and none of the NPC's are talking anymore and I have part of some words on the lower right of the screen(see screenshot). When I reached the control room I had no way of exiting. I reloaded my save twice to see if it did it both times and it did. The control room is in the screenshot.
[img]https://nbkillas.com/images/bm_c1a0b0000.jpg[/img]
[img]https://nbkillas.com/images/bm_c1a0b0001.jpg[/img]

item.title: Control Room Bug
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
You have the AI disabled, type ai_disable in the console to toggle it.

Read full topic
